input.raw_request_summary: User wants to create a basic single-agent workflow that generates a plan, confirms it, and executes with trace logging.
input.constraints_summary: Baseline happy path scenario, must demonstrate Context->Plan->Confirm->Trace flow.

output.final_intent_summary: Single-agent baseline workflow with Context (ctx-1), Plan (plan-1, 3 steps), Confirm (confirm-1, approved), Trace (trace-1, 8 events).
